item.title: Compound Interest - Increasing Salary/Contributions
item.description: I couldn’t find a spreadsheet to do compound interest and retirement calculations with increasing contributions (i.e. to account for salary increases over time). There are online calculators that do so, but I wanted it in spreadsheet form, so I could add to it. So I made the following spreadsheet that compares the difference that a certain yearly salary increase makes on the value of your portfolio and on the amount of income you can draw from that portfolio based on a certain withdrawal rate.
